'''''Amon Hen'' 145''' is the one-hundred-and-forty-fifth issue of the [[The Tolkien Society]]'s bimonthly journal ''[[Amon Hen (journal)|Amon Hen]]'', published in May [[1997]].

==Contents==
* Cover: ''Untitled''
** By: Sarah Mackie
* Editorial
** By: Andrew McMurry
* Announcements
* Seminar 1997 - Manchester
** By: Maria Kuteeva
* [[Oxonmoot]] 1997
* Tolkien Events
* Tolkien Society Trading Ltd
** By: Malcolm Lindley & Mike Percival
* Bywater Announcements
** By: Malcolm Lindley
* AGM Reports
** By: Richard Fraser Overton
** By: [[Patricia Reynolds|Pat Reynolds]]
* Lydney Park
** By: [[Helen Armstrong]]
* Behind Glass Doors
** By: Annie Haward
* ''A Whisper Through the Leaves''
** By: Matt Bower
* Artwork: ''Almost Felt you Liked the Forest!''
** By: Ian Collier
* Review: I.C.E.'s ''[[Arnor: The People]]''
** By: Rob Bielby
* Hildifons's Half of Amon Hen
** By: [[Sumner Gary Hunnewell|Gary Hunnewell]]
* Annie's Allsorts
** By: Annie Haward
* Cartoon (from ''The Guardian'' 22/1/97)
** By: Hector Breeze
* Mathom
** By: Ian Collier & Anke Buttner
* Letters Pages
* Review: J.R.R. Tolkien by C. Moseley
** By: Ian Collier
* Artwork: Arwen and the Banner
** By: Ian Collier
* Tolk Folk
* New Members/Committee
